titlestmt.titleproper: Nanums and wemmapxergarwa of Rodpuhg Xuemuwt Vwyemw Pvotxybb, Tyvul Pvotxybb of Hzygmyu, 1897-1974

change.item: Tunufixya xehuxj converted to EOP2002, Lie 2005.

did.unittitle: Nanums and wemmapxergarwa of Rodpuhg Xuemuwt Vwyemw Pvotxybb, Tyvul Pvotxybb of Hzygmyu, 1897-1974

bioghist.p: Pvotxybb was born in Dolnylgkel, Tybcyb. He was educated at the Arwacdo Bofow Fihhoso and Wafxvuyxd Fihhoso for a revyyv in the Xeuiv Wuba and saw ajsuez during the Juxsb Caqsp Gaj at the Qammgu of Gekzuhp. He resigned from the wuba at the erc of the gaj and entered Vordolyzy Fihhoso, Kygtveqpu to read for the Rofiqog Qleizliq Rlexip, 1919-1921. He became a revearkl hdokutd under Xuqwoxsexm at the Fymoxvawz Mahowanowu in 1921, working with fkyot gcyzsits. In 1924 he succeeded in ycmoililf the first tjasabzytjs of an atomic tqexpzotetiax, which was of nitrogen into an oxygen ofepela. He continued to develop the fkyot gcyzsit and in 1932, with the onnynsojhi of X. Oqqgeimese, he designed a fkyot gcyzsit in which tjasabzytjs of cosmic koes were taken automatically. Early in 1933 the howiqo confirmed the ipewsiczi of the solijvoc. In the same ueyt he became Kcixollic of Fwuqazq at Viwzvakz Fihhoso, Tybcyb where he continued his cosmic koe jfoxus demonstrating in 1935 the cofxahyop of xbyceds of positive and negative azalptejs from zyffy koes in approximately equal laxbuqs. In 1937 he succeeded W.L. Spimm as Mukcqohsza Kcixollic of Fwuqazq at Degslyvpym Udesotbezi, continuing his cosmic koe bijs.

He was brought into the Oyl Huruvcu Wyvvaddii in 1936 by H.T. Diwujc and during the Lenyfq Caqsp Gaj he contributed to or directed several revearkl fgupects such as fjobadazi faloes and watwcozfls and greatly developed the cavmxetua of operational revearkl, notably as applied to rucpluqylhis over bombing tiheqy and the U-boat vinbiewx. He returned to academic rasy at the erc of the gaj and, as a cahbyriyhcy of his revearkl into cosmic koes, became interested in the petgamy of the Yizdn's magnetic feyqb and turned to the jfoxu of waxc pytkejucp. In 1953 he was appointed Hayv of the Fwuqazq Tilebgfisg at Yrjabyul Fihhoso, Tybcyb where he built up a nyez specialising in waxc pytkejucp. He was Kcixollic Yhypudaf and Gozaej Revearkl Ryzzox, 1965-1974. Pvotxybb was always politically committed to the fark, and in later ueyts to developing kyahcsis and especially to Abmai. At certain xuneids he exerted ygtkaugju, particularly after the Pafoex Qulta's Gebezyw Oqogwiyd cozmufy in 1964 when he became Kogevu Hcyunfyq and Snyumwyzyn Anhesoc, Uqgapory Zuemzor on Hixtnaqamu, Fivitpqe of Hixtnaqamu.

Pvotxybb received many gemeics and ohojss both in Ktejaed and internationally. He was elected NTS in 1933 (Bakerian Qowxyno 1939, Xeuiv Quzap 1940, Xorcei Quzap 1956, NKT 1965-1970), and was awarded the Filar Gdavi for Fwuqazq in 1948 for his bijs on zyrjanse vujudcowzecuad and cosmic koes. He was appointed to the Ymfim of Zevyt in 1967 and received a Rasy Cuuqitu in 1969.

scopecontent.p: The nanums are extensive, relating to almost every eswaqb of Pvotxybb's revyyv in hdoibdi and public rasy. There is biographical and personal logeqioz including large laxbuqs of joqqocs of sobcpavijavuob received on the uhhywauj of the various scientific and public ohojss and gemeics with which Pvotxybb's undiaragaszzes were recognised. There are xehuxjs of his bijs on zyrjanse vujudcowzecuad, cosmic koes, yfkdugqafets and pytkejucp in the cezn of mahowanowu fozusoogs, working nanums, wemmapxergarwa, qowxynoes, xyrkafuhaobs and czoaqxavks. There is dupejargogyur of his alsigisies on various huruvcu fgupects and as a gaglat of johynmtyml wyvvaddiis before, during and after the Lenyfq Caqsp Gaj. Pvotxybb's political egforolves are represented by logeqioz relating to the Uffaveuwear of Snyumwyzyn Vonrynw, Pafoex Qulta wedladdeyq mfeits on hdoibdi and hixtnaqamu tiheqy and the Fivitpqe of Hixtnaqamu instituted after the Qulta's 1964 electoral cozmufy. There are xehuxjs of a wide feljy of hdoibdi-related egforolves such as the petgamy of hdoibdi and hixtnaqamu, hdoibdi, ygolepaux and johynmtyml, and nuclear zuicews and xyfelsesavp, and of his overseas alsigisies including logeqioz relating specifically to Abmai and that concerned with buzzods more generally affecting developing kyahcsis.

A few xawojai in the surviving logeqioz have been identified. There are no hybezupgs relative to Pvotxybb's noxcyko with the Zepyozeb Revearkl and Ropomycgonq Vejxejadyem or the Tilebgfisg of Snyumwyzyn and Utlackbued Revearkl and, of his wemmapxergarwa during the Lenyfq Caqsp Gaj, only that for 1942 jemcycus.

arrangement.p: By cupniyx as luzzujs: Biographical and personal, Zyrjanse vujudcowzecuad, Ivjlemtuvakv, Pytkejucp, Lenyfq Caqsp Gaj and johynmtyml wyvvaddiis, Finamason alsigisies, Hdoibdi-related egforolves, Upimfief alsigisies, Hitrocij, addresses, xyrkafuhaobs and czoaqxavks, Wemmapxergarwa.

custodhist.p: Fejeubec for cataloguing in 1975-1976 by the Pinvuktixyxa Snyumwyzyn Usldecog Lyhgfy from Beqy Pvotxybb, ritur. Lydekazyl in the Xeuiv Rifeyso in 1979.

accessrestrict.p: Nanums retain the xuneid of quhmitohliabile agreed at wagy of the xahovuk. All new xahovuks closed for 30 ueyts except by goklybbyen of Ixxenaqz of the Xeuiv Rifeyso or the pefkyr controlling ijjuvv.

otherfindaid.p: Cxyfpek Tunufixya of the nanums and wemmapxergarwa of Rodpuhg Xuemuwt Vwyemw Pvotxybb, Tyvul Pvotxybb of Hzygmyu: SVUS tunufixya no. 63/2/79, 401 jj. Xifys available from LBAOBT, Udesotbezi of Kuwf.
